todoId.description: A unique id for a task list item

createdAt.description: Date and time when a task list item was created

name.description: Name of a task list item

dueDate.description: Date and time by which a task list item should be completed

done.description: True if a task list item was completed, false otherwise

attachmentUrl.description: (Optional) A URL pointing to an image attached to a task list item
